com.xorprogramming.game.achievement

Class AchievementManager<E extends Enum<E>,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xorprogramming.game.achievement.AchievementManager<E,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - An enum that contains the various game actions that could trigger an achievement check
    T - The type of object to check to see if the achievement is unlocked
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Savable, Iterable<Achievement<?,?>>

    public final class AchievementManager<E extends Enum<E>,T>
extends Object
implements Iterable<Achievement<?,?>>, Savable
    This class manages a collection of Achievement instances. It handles the checking of all achievements that correspond to an event and allows AchievementListeners to respond to unlocked achievements. The achievements stored in an AchievementManager can be saved and restored using IOUtils.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts
